Monster gives me items
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Items: Monster gives me items
By Anonymous on Saturday, September 9, 2000 - 02:08 pm:

What are you supposeed to do with items that monsters give you?I mean...you just sell them or give them to your monster and thats it? That sucks.

By Foster on Saturday, September 9, 2000 - 04:01 pm:

well, usually,.. its not a bad idea to sell them,... but some of them, you can go ahead and give them back to your monster

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, September 9, 2000 - 06:40 pm:

Some of the items are pretty valuble, some aren't. If you're going to give it to your monster and you want to know what effect it will have, check out the list of items and foods and their effects by Dark Phoenix, in the FAQ section.
